other_tests.findings: Elder sister had elevated TSH level; younger sister had normal TSH level at birth.
Enlarged multinodular thyroid gland, total volume of 31 ml at age 12; 33 ml at age 14.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased thyroid volume from 31 ml at age 12 to 33 ml at age 14.

other_tests.findings: Asymmetrically enlarged thyroid gland, initial volume 3.88 ml at birth and 23 ml at age 8.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased thyroid volume from 3.88 ml at birth to 23 ml at age 8.

other_tests.findings: Received cochlear implant due to progressive hearing loss.
Identified a novel de novo mutation in THRB gene.
Both had compound heterozygosity for SLC26A4 mutations.
